title: pullAip-piravi taravENum kaNNA
sahitya:
pullAip-piravi taravENum kaNNA punitamAna pala kOTi piravi tandAlum brndAvanamidil oru


anupallavi

  pullAgilum neDunAL nillAdu AdalinAl kallAp-piravi tara vENumE kaNNA kamala malariNaigaL aNaiya enadu uLLam pulakitam uTriDum bhavamaTriDUm ena


caraNam    oru kaNam un padam paDum endan mElE maru kaNam nAn uyarvEn menmElE un tirumEni en mElE amarndiDum oru kAlE tiru maghaLE nAn malaraDi peyarndu unait-toDarnda rAdhaikku iDam taruvEnE dishai dishaiyenganum paraviDum kuzhal ishai mayangi varum pala gOpiyaruDanE shiranda rasamighu naTanam nI ADavum shrutiyODu layamighakkalaindu pADavum tiLaippilE varum kaLippilE enakku iNaiyArena magizhvEnE tavamighu surarODu munivarum iyalA tanitta perum pEraDaivanE evvuyirkkum uL kalakkum iraivanE yamunait-turaivanE enakkumoru
